Detailed Description

Opens a context-menu on execution. The context-menu is defined by an item-container which can be assigned by the constructor. Optionally the items can be added later by OpenContextMenuAction::AddItem without specifying an explicit item-container.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

OpenContextMenuAction::OpenContextMenuAction (   ) 
 

If the default constructor is used, the parameters have to be provided by using the method Init.

OpenContextMenuAction::OpenContextMenuAction (  Dispatcher *  dispatcher,
const WString &  text,
const ImageObtainer &  icon,
BOOLEAN  enabled = TRUE,
AbstractItemContainer *  item_cont = 0,
ContextMenu::Corner  corner = ContextMenu::BottomLeft,
XYDIM  x = -1,
XYDIM  y = -1
) 
 

Parameters:
dispatcher Dispatcher which will be informed about property changes. Usually a window or control is used as dispatcher.
text Text of the item. The GUI-component using the item decides whether the text will be shown.
icon Icon of the item. The GUI-component using the item decides whether the icon will be shown.
enabled Sets the enabled-property. The GUI-component using the item usually indicates the enabled-property by a different look of the text.
item_cont Item-container which contains the items of the context-menu.
corner Corner of the context-menu.
x x-position of the corner. Use -1, if a default value should be used (0 for the corners BottomLeft and TopLeft, the right display side for the corners BottomRight and TopRight)
y y-position of the corner. Use -1, if a default value should be used. (0 for the corners TopLeft and TopRight, the bottom display side for the corners BottomRight and BottomLeft)

y y-position of the corner. Use -1, if a default value should be used. (0 for the corners TopLeft and TopRight, the bottom display side for the corners BottomRight and BottomLeft)

Member Function Documentation

BOOLEAN OpenContextMenuAction::AddItem (  Item *  item  ) 
 

Adds the item item after the already added items. For other item-operations use AbstractItemGrid::GetItemContainer and invoke the corresponding methods. If no item-container has been specified by the constructor, a default item-container is used.

BOOLEAN OpenContextMenuAction::Execute (   )  [virtual]
 

Opens a context-menu with the added items as content.

Reimplemented from Action.

AbstractItemContainer* OpenContextMenuAction::GetItemContainer (   )  const [inline]

BOOLEAN OpenContextMenuAction::SetProperty (  ResourceParser &  parser,
const GuiObjectFactory::PropertyId  prop_id,
UINT16  object_id
) 
 

Initializes the instance by reading out a resource file generated by ARAGON. This method may not be invoked by the MMI in a direct manner and might be changed in future releases.
